wikibase-newlexeme-fieldset: Title of the form in Special:NewLexeme
wikibase-newlexeme-language: Label for field in the lexeme creation form.
wikibase-lexeme-view-language: Description when there is the language but not lexical category
wikibase-lexeme-view-lexical-category: Description when there is the lexical category but not language
wikibase-lexeme-view-language-lexical-ca: Description when both lexical category and language are present
